task.title: Import Translated Strings
task.shortdesc: Steps for updating the translations of strings modified or added to the source code after the project was created.

step.cmd: In File menu, select Open JavaPM Project.
Locate and open the JavaPM project to be updated.
In Tasks menu, select Import Translated Properties.
In the Translated File text box enter the name of the translated .properties file to import or use the Browse... button to select a file.
Select the language of the .properties file in the Translation Language drop-down list.
Click the Accept button to import the file.

taskbody.result: All translations imported from the selected .properties file are added to the corresponding .properties files of the source code.
